Engine::FatalException

FatalException Class Reference

#include <com_exceptions.h>

Inheritance diagram for FatalException:

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 FatalException (std::string msg, bool print=true, std::ostream &stream=std::cerr)

Detailed Description

Exception class for exceptions the program probably shouldn't attempt to recover from. Examples are failure to initialize the specified video mode, initialization errors, memory allocation errors and so on.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

bool  print = true,
std::ostream &  stream = std::cerr 
)

Constructor for FatalException class.

Parameters:
msg The message to print/store.
print Set to true if you want to print the message to stream. Default is true.
stream The stream to print msg to. Default is std::cerr.
